snippet: The mother of a boy accused of fatally stabbing a classmate may have sought to transfer him to another school to get away from students she said had been bullying him, according to a new report.
abstract: Independent investigator for New York City school system reports that mother of Noel Estevez, accused in fatal stabbing of classmate Timothy Crump, may have sought to transfer him from Intermediate School 117 in the Bronx, to get him away from students she says were bullying him.
lead_paragraph: The mother of a boy accused of fatally stabbing a classmate may have sought to transfer him to another school to get away from students she said had been bullying him, according to a new report.

headline.main: New York Inquiry on Boy, 14, in Stabbing Is Released
headline.print_headline: City Inquiry on Boy, 14, in Stabbing Is Released
